Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Armitage due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Armitage due to signal problems.

 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #37 Sedgwick Temporary Southbound Reroute near Van Buren/Wacker
ShortDescription: SB 37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker Drive, Adams, and Clinton due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #37 Sedgwick buses are temporarily rerouted via Van Buren, Wacker Drive, Adams, and Clinton due to, street blockage near Van Buren/Wacker.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
